getJobs

public java.util.List getJobs(JobType type)
Returns all the job records of the given type. If type is null, returns all job records known to the service.

Parameters:
type - The job type
Returns:
The list of jobs of the given type

getJobs

public java.util.List getJobs(org.gridlab.gridsphere.portlet.User user,
                              JobType type)
Returns all the job records of the given type associated with the given user. If type is null, returns all job records associated with the given user.

Parameters:
user - The user
type - The job type
Returns:
The list of jobs of the given type
